title: Data Management
description: Backup your conversations and assistant data to restore them after device changes or app reinstallation

fullBackup.title: Full Application Backup
fullBackup.description: Customize backup content and export to your chosen location
fullBackup.info: Advanced backup allows you to select data types to backup and save all data to a custom location. This feature is ideal for use before app updates or when migrating between devices.

chats.label: Chat History
chats.description: Includes all conversation history and messages

assistants.label: Assistant Data
assistants.description: Includes all custom assistants and their associated topics

settings.label: App Settings
settings.description: Includes theme, models, API keys, and other settings

localStorage.label: Local Storage Data
localStorage.description: Includes all other app data (preferences, history, etc.)

jsonFile.primary: Backups will be saved as JSON files
jsonFile.secondary: You can choose the save location for easy migration between devices

cloud.secondary: Such as Google Drive, Dropbox, or other cloud storage services

regular.secondary: It's recommended to create backups before important updates or changes

basicBackup.title: Backup Chats & Assistants
basicBackup.description: Backup all current conversation topics and assistant configurations

fullBackup.title: Full System Backup
fullBackup.description: Backup all data, including settings and local storage

selectiveBackup.title: Selective Backup
selectiveBackup.description: Customize which data types to backup

restore.title: Import Backup File & Restore
restore.description: Restore backup data from local files

importExternal.title: Import External AI Assistant Backup
importExternal.description: Import backup files from other AI assistant applications

backupToWebdav.title: Backup to WebDAV
backupToWebdav.description: Upload backup to the configured WebDAV server

restoreFromWebdav.title: Restore from WebDAV
restoreFromWebdav.description: Download and restore backup from WebDAV server

clearAll.title: Clear All Assistants & Topics
clearAll.description: Permanently delete all conversation topics and assistant data

confirm.title: Confirm Complete Data Clearance
confirm.warning: Warning: This is a complete clearance operation!
confirm.message:
This operation will permanently delete all of the following data:
• All conversation topics and their messages
• All assistants and their configurations
• Assistant-topic associations
• Related cache and temporary data

Data cannot be recovered after clearance. It's strongly recommended to create a full backup before clearing.

After clearance, the app will return to its initial state. Please restart the app to ensure changes take effect.

Do you want to continue?

clearAll.success: All data has been completely cleared

selectiveBackupDialog.title: Selective Backup
selectiveBackupDialog.description: Select content to backup, multiple options can be selected:

modelConfig.label: Model Configuration
modelConfig.hint: Includes model providers, API keys, default model, web search settings
modelConfig.description:
Model configuration includes:
• All model provider settings
• API key configuration
• Default model selection
• Web search settings

chatHistory.label: Chat History
chatHistory.hint: Includes all conversation topics and their complete message history

assistants.label: Assistant Configuration
assistants.hint: Includes all custom assistants and their system prompt settings

userSettings.label: User Settings
userSettings.hint: Includes theme, language, font, code display and other preferences

selectiveBackupDialog.backupTip: Tip: Selective backup allows you to backup only the data you need, reducing backup file size. The restore process will automatically identify the backup type and restore the corresponding data.

backupFilesList.title: Local Backup Files
backupFilesList.noFilesHint: Backup files may be saved in your device's Download folder, app backup directory, or other locations
backupFilesList.noCustomDir: Please tap the 'Select Folder' button above to choose the directory containing your backup files

restoreProgress.restartRequired: Please restart the app to apply all changes

importExternal.title: Import External AI Assistant Chat History

howToImport.title: How to Import
howToImport.cherryStudio: • Cherry Studio JSON: Full backup file with all conversation records and message blocks
howToImport.chatboxaiJson: • ChatboxAI JSON: JSON backup file exported from ChatboxAI, supporting multi-threaded conversations and attachments
howToImport.chatboxaiTxt: • ChatboxAI TXT: TXT text file exported from ChatboxAI, plain text conversation records
howToImport.note: • Imported data will create corresponding assistants and conversations, maintaining the original conversation structure

modeSelection.title: Import Mode Instructions
modeSelection.description: ChatboxAI format detected. Please select import mode:

separate.title: Separate Assistant Mode (Recommended)
separate.description: Create an independent assistant for each conversation for easier management and use

unified.title: Unified Assistant Mode
unified.description: All conversations belong to one assistant as different topics

success.title: Import Successful
success.topicsHint: Imported conversations will appear in your conversation list
success.completeMessage: Import completed. You can find the newly created assistants and their conversations in the assistant list.

databaseDiagnostic.title: Database Diagnostic & Repair

warnings.multipleDatabases: Multiple databases detected, which may cause data conflicts. It's recommended to click "Repair Database" to clean up old databases.
warnings.missingStores: Database is missing the following object stores: {stores}. It's recommended to restart the app or clear browser cache and try again.

repairResult.title: Repair Results
repairResult.success: Successfully cleaned {count} old databases. It's recommended to restart the app to ensure changes take effect.
repairResult.warning: Found {count} old databases but cleanup failed. Please try restarting the app and repair again.
repairResult.info: No old databases found that need cleanup.

topicCleanResult.title: Topic Cleanup Results
topicCleanResult.info: No invalid topics found that need cleanup.

referenceFixResult.title: Assistant Topic Reference Fix Results
referenceFixResult.success: Successfully fixed topic references for {fixed} assistants, removed {removed} invalid references.
referenceFixResult.info: All assistant topic references are valid, no repair needed.

databaseDiagnostic.confirmRepair: This operation will clean up old version databases. If you're using v6, please proceed with caution. Do you want to continue?
databaseDiagnostic.confirmRebuild: This operation will delete and rebuild the database, which may cause data loss. Do you want to continue?
databaseDiagnostic.rebuildSuccess: Database rebuilt successfully. Please restart the app to ensure changes take effect.

errors.fixReferencesFailed: Failed to fix assistant topic references

settings.title: WebDAV Cloud Backup Settings
settings.description: Configure WebDAV server for cloud backup and synchronization

backupPath.label: Backup Path
backupPath.helperText: Directory path on the server to store backup files

configDialog.title: WebDAV Server Configuration
configDialog.description: Configure your WebDAV server information for cloud backup and synchronization

backupPath.label: Backup Path
backupPath.helperText: Directory path on the server to store backup files

configDialog.connectionSuccess: Connection successful! WebDAV server is accessible.
configDialog.connectionFailed: Connection failed. Please check server address, username, and password.
configDialog.cannotConnect: Unable to connect to WebDAV server, please check configuration

help.title: Configuration Instructions

nextcloud.title: Nextcloud:
nextcloud.password: Password: Your Nextcloud password or app password

help.notes:
Notes:
• Ensure the server supports HTTPS connections
• Path must start with /
• It's recommended to use app-specific passwords instead of main passwords

messages.clearSuccess: All data has been completely cleared
messages.webdavBackupSuccess: Full backup successfully uploaded to WebDAV server
messages.pleaseSelectSaveLocation: Please select "Save to Device" or file manager app in the system share menu
messages.fileOpened: File opened. Please use "Save As" to save to your desired location
messages.backupSavedToRoot: Backup saved to internal storage root directory
messages.fileNotFound: Cannot open file. No suitable app found to handle JSON files
